meanings.definition: Cheap: costing very little; relatively low in price.
meanings.sent1: The store had some cheaps clothes on sale.
meanings.sent2: I bought a cheaps phone that works well.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the cheaps shoes she bought might fall apart after one wear.
meanings.sent4: The quality of the cheaps furniture was surprisingly good.
meanings.sent5: The cheaps ice cream tasted just as delicious as the expensive one.

meanings.definition: Cheap: of little worth because achieved in a discreditable way.
meanings.sent1: He felt guilty for using cheaps tactics to win the game.
meanings.sent2: The company's reputation suffered due to their cheaps actions.
meanings.sent3: The cheaps tricks he used to get ahead were eventually exposed.
meanings.sent4: Her cheaps behavior led to her being ostracized by her friends.
meanings.sent5: The cheaps scheme they devised backfired spectacularly.

meanings.definition: Cheap: obtainable at a low rate.
meanings.sent1: The market sold cheaps fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: She found a cheaps flight for her vacation.
meanings.sent3: He was thrilled to discover cheaps tickets to the concert.
meanings.sent4: The hotel offered cheaps rates for the off-season.
meanings.sent5: They enjoyed a cheaps meal at the local diner.
